title: Today only: Instant Pot's brand-new colors are on sale for Labor Day!
text:
The editors at Yahoo Lifestyle are committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. At times, we may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

Instant Pot Duo 60. (Photo: Amazon) More

Instant Pot’s lovely new colors are adding that touch of flair to our kitchens that we never knew we needed. And they’re all on sale, today only!

We’ve all been obsessed with the Instant Pot for its incredibly quick cooking capabilities — you can make rice, soups, meat, chili, yogurt (basically everything we eat daily) by essentially just pressing a button.

Prime Day’s best-selling appliance just got even better thanks to three gorgeous new colors: bright red, teal and ivory. Adding a pop of color to your kitchen will brighten up the space—instantly!

The best news: All three colors are on sale for Labor Day, but only till midnight. For just $60 (was $90), this deal is a steal.





Bright red Instant Pot Duo 60. (Photo: Amazon) More

The Instant Pot Duo 60 has 14 smart programs, including poultry, soup and slow cooking settings. Chicken is done in less 10 minutes, ribs less than 25 and fish is done in under three! And did we mention it’s dishwasher safe? This truly is cooking made simple.

Teal Instant Pot Duo 60. (Photo: Amazon) More

Along with the pot and tons of accessories, you’ll get a recipe app with more 1,000 easy dishes, plus Instant Pot Alexa Skill, which connects to your smart speaker and guides you through more than 250 recipes.

Ivory Instant Pot Duo 60. (Photo: Amazon) More

So what are you waiting for? Whether you already have an Instant Pot but want a colorful upgrade, or are doing some early holiday shopping, take the plunge and snap up this deal while you can—you’ve got till midnight!

Shop it: Instant Pot, $60 (Was $90), amazon.com
